title: The Scene Part Two
description: The one man I can’t stay away from is the man I swore to destroy.I came to Miami determined to reveal the truth behind my brother’s death. Now I’ve discovered that Xavier is the crime king running this city — and I’m going to take him down - if I can keep my hands off him long enough to think straight.I’m in over my head now, but there’s no going back.
author: Roxy Sloane
